description: Christopher Aurier dies in hospital after being shot in the French city of Toulouse.
title: Christopher Aurier, brother of Tottenham's Serge, shot dead in France
title_page: Christopher Aurier, brother of Tottenham's Serge, shot dead in France - BBC News
maintext: "We are supporting Serge at this difficult time and we ask that the privacy of the player and his family is respected. Everybody at the club sends their sincerest condolences to Serge and his family. Our thoughts are with them all."
